thread.title: Quiet, Clean and a Great Night's Sleep
thread.title_full: Quiet, Clean and a Great Night's Sleep - Review of Homewood Suites by Hilton New York/Midtown Manhattan Times Square-South, NY, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: MRS62
title: Quiet, Clean and a Great Night's Sleep
text: If you are looking for the quietest hotel in NYC, this is the place!! No hallway noise, no noise outside, no noise from the room next door. Peaceful!! The shades work more than well....no light to wake you up in the morning! Continuous hot coffee in the lobby. Awesome breakfast. So close to MSG. Grab this hotel!
